actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The deep one can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Frenzied Rage
special_abilities.desc: If a deep one takes 10 or more damage from a single attack, it has advantage on its Claws attack and gains a +2 bonus to damage with its Claws until the end of its next turn.
